items.name: 8 Legs Run Club
items.introduction: Inclusive group for everyone, from first-time joggers to seasoned sprinters to enjoy daily sessions of movement, motivation, and community.
items.shortDescription: Join the Happenings Cast for our 8 legs run club.
items.longDescription: Join the 8 legs Run Club! From first-time joggers to seasoned sprinters – this vibrant, inclusive group invites everyone to enjoy daily self-guided sessions of movement, motivation, and community. Our Happenings Cast kick off this healthy hangout by bringing together travelers of all fitness levels, with a balance of camaraderie, friendly challenges, and shared goals. Each session is designed to energize and connect every member on their fitness journey throughout the voyage.

items.name: 90s Boy Band Dance Class
items.introduction: You know the songs, now learn some N’synchronized dance skills as our influencers teach you iconic boy band moves.
items.shortDescription: Larger than life boy band choreography session.
items.longDescription: The synchronized lasso. That jerky elbow shuffle thing. The obligatory finger-point — these endearing dance moves à la everyone’s favorite boy bands (remember 5ive?!) were all the rage during the Y2K-era and now’s your time to turn it up higher than 98º as our onboard influencers lead a jam-filled session transforming you into the next Timberlake. And even if you end up sidelining Fatone-style, you’re sure to get a hearty dose of totally 90s nostalgia while flexing some *iconic* moves.

items.name: Solo Sailor: Morning Meetup
items.introduction: Let us jump-start your morning with coffee — and a mixer to connect you with other solo Sailors.
items.shortDescription: Start your day with fellow solo Sailors.
items.longDescription: BYOC (Bring Your Own Coffee) and enjoy a hit of caffeine with a side of shiny new friendship. At this meetup hosted by our Happenings Cast, you can sip your choice of tea, coffee, or espresso as we discuss the day’s happenings. (And keep an eye out for more chances to mingle with other solo Sailors as the voyage continues).

items.name: VHS Workout (Videos/Headbands/Simmons)
items.introduction: An over-the-top flash-back to the golden age of exercise videos and 80s personalities.
items.shortDescription: First Come, First Serve.
items.longDescription: Come and get into the day-glow 80s groove. During this full-body workout, you’ll move and groove to a throwback soundtrack full of well-known, high-energy dance anthems to inspire everyone to “dance,” “with somebody,” or "feel the hee-eee-eeaat.”
needToKnows: Wear something to move in and close-toed shoes.
Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'add to agenda', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Seats cannot be reserved or saved.
Keep your hands to yourself!  NO touching of any cast/performer/crew member or Sailor.
There will be a standby line 5 minutes prior to your calories crying.

items.name: The Stitch Up - Book On Board!
Pickleball
items.introduction: Quick to learn, social, and a lot of fun, Pickleball is a fast-paced sport that combines elements of tennis, badminton, and ping-pong.
items.shortDescription: Discover the world's latest sports obsession.
items.longDescription: Put on some comfy clothes and get ready to break a sweat because you're about to fall in love with Pickleball — the world's latest sports obsession. For this self guided session, all you need to play is a couple of paddles, a ball, and a net, and we got it all ready and waiting for you at the Sports Court on Deck 16. But before joining us for a match, you must know one (very important) thing: learning to play Pickleball is incredibly easy... the hard part is stopping. Trust us, we know.
needToKnows: Pickleball is open to all Sailors on a first come first serve basis.
Please be mindful of your time on the court if others are waiting to play.
This will be a self-guided session.

items.name: Rice, Rice Baby ($ USD) - Book On Board!
Last One Standing
items.introduction: Pit your wits & knowledge against those of your fellow Sailors.
items.shortDescription: An immersive trivia experience played on-your-feet
items.longDescription: Think you're a trivia whiz? Step on up and compete in this elimination trivia game. It's easy. Each question has answers color-coded red, green, and blue. Just stand on the section/color of the floor of the answer you want to choose. If you're wrong, you're eliminated from the round and will need to take a seat. The questions continue until just one person is left standing!
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'book', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.

items.name: Feel the Beat: Zumba Class
items.introduction: Half dance party + half aerobics session = a full-body workout that will leave you feeling bouncy and energized.
items.shortDescription: A workout so fun, you won't realize it's exercise.
items.longDescription: If dragging yourself to the gym just isn't how you want to spend your Virgin Voyage but you’d like to break a sweat, this event is for you. Zumba is more party than fitness class, set to a contagious blend of Latin and international rhythms that provides a fun and effective workout. Developed in Colombia, this method combines low-intensity and high-intensity moves for an interval-style, calorie-burning dance party. It's every bit as feel-good as an 80s music video, but the leotard is optional.

items.name: Merry Morning Mind Benders
items.introduction: The holiday season is a time for giving. Give yourself the gift of fun when you mingle with fellow Sailors for some low-key morning brain boosters.
items.shortDescription: Wake your brain up (gently) with some games.
items.longDescription: Enjoying the relaxation of your voyage but trying to make sure your mind stays sharp? Come enjoy this holiday brain-teaser session. We'll lay out an array of challenges that includes riddles, anagrams, crosswords, sudoku, geography quizzes, and more — all with a festive holiday twist. Bring a friend, or go solo and make friends while solving a tough crossword clue together.

items.name: Happy Holidays with The Hostess & Friends
items.introduction: Ring in the holidays with this cabaret show, hosted by one of our onboard celebrities and featuring a variety of other special performers!
items.shortDescription: A cabaret show to get you in the holiday spirit.
items.longDescription: Join the Hostess at this new cabaret show, featuring special guests and performances by onboard celebs. So get ready for a night of your favorite (secular) holiday tunes, and prepare to leave full of festive spirit.

items.name: Bingo Card Sales
items.introduction: Head to The Red Room prior to bingo to purchase your cards and get the (bingo) party started.
items.shortDescription: Grab your bingo cards before the game.
items.longDescription: Make your way to the stage to purchase as many bingo cards as you want. As you enter, you’ll notice the DJ already has the place bumping and in full party mode — accompanied by gorgeous lighting and videos to set the mood. Trust us; you're going to want in on these games.
needToKnows: Doors open 30 minutes prior to the show.
Bingo Card Sales end 15 minutes prior to the show.
There is a cost to purchase bingo cards.

items.name: Creative Flow with the Artist
items.introduction: A laid-back creative hangout with the Artist open to all skill levels. No rules, just fun.
items.shortDescription: A free flowing creativity session with the Artist!
items.longDescription: A playful, open-ended art hangout. There’s no set lesson or specific project, just time, space and flow to explore creativity at your own pace, share inspiration, and enjoy the vibe. Come as you are; whether you make a little or a lot is totally up to you. All levels are welcome.

items.name: Guest Artist: Taylor Reed
items.introduction: Groove to the soulful sounds of Taylor Reed as she weaves violin melodies with percussion beats!
items.shortDescription: Soulful strings and angelic vocals.
items.longDescription: Hailing from Tampa, FL, Taylor Reed channels her natural creativity and spontaneity through a looping station, building an elegantly layered, engrossingly soulful sound. Weaving violin melodies, bold and invigorating percussion, and angelic vocals through groove-infused creations, her pop/R&B music elevates any space.

items.name: DJ James Campbell at Aquatic Club
items.introduction: Vibe out in the midday sun with strangers, lovers, and everyone in between.
items.shortDescription: A splash of afternoon sunshine.
items.longDescription: At the Aquatic Club, it's all about good energy. You'll hear a mix of current and classic pop, Latin, reggae, hip-hop (of the chill variety), dance, minimal house music, and remixes. Perfect for poolside lounging — cocktail optional.

items.name: Seas the Knowledge: Progressive Trivia
items.introduction: Play the long game, and test your trivia stamina!
items.shortDescription: Test your trivia knowledge throughout the voyage.
items.longDescription: Enter if you dare our first Progressive Trivia challenge where Sailors will compete daily, and tally scores throughout the entire voyage to crown a winner!

items.name: Bingo with the Happenings Cast
items.introduction: Originated at an Italian lottery in the 1500s and enjoyed now in community halls all over the world, bingo is a centuries-spanning crowd-pleaser.
items.shortDescription: Play a classic game with some onboard celebs.
items.longDescription: Join us, Get a card, and settle in for a high-energy version of this small-town classic, run with flair by our Happenings Cast. They'll be calling out lucky numbers and, in between rounds, going around the room to introduce you to your fellow bingo players, and set up smaller games. Whether or not you come away with a big cash prize, you'll leave this bingo night a winner.
needToKnows: Doors open 30 minutes prior to the show.
Bingo card sales start 45 minutes prior to the event
Bingo Card Sales end 15 minutes prior to the show.
There is a cost to purchase bingo cards.

items.name: Shot for Shot: A Cocktail and Photography Workshop ($ USD) - Book On Board!
Gotta Dodge 'Em All
items.introduction: Blue Ballers vs. Dirty Dodgers vs. Beastie Ballers vs. Artful Dodgers — it’s a spritely game of dodgeball.
items.shortDescription: A rousing game of dogeball at the b-ball court.
items.longDescription: After laying out the rules, the games begin and teams begin to be eliminated with each passing round. A member of your Happenings Cast will host this event, and announce the victor at the end of the match. Gotta. Dodge. 'Em. All.
needToKnows: Wear close-toed shoes and athletic clothes (because... sports)
In case it in isn't obvious, you will, in fact, be hit with balls.
Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event. The venue will open 15 minutes prior to the event, and space is limited.
By selecting 'book', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.

items.name: Suitcase of Secrets - Book on Board! $$
Salty Trivia: Around the World
items.introduction: Test your world smarts, no passport required.
items.shortDescription: Globetrot your way to trivia domination.
items.longDescription: Think you know your capitals from your coastlines? "Salty Trivia: Around The World" takes you on a whirlwind tour of global wonders, wild facts, and geographic curveballs. From iconic landmarks to cultural gems and off-the-map surprises, this quiz will challenge even the savviest sailor. No need to pack a bag, just bring your brain, a bit of wanderlust, and a taste for trivia glory. Let the journey begin.
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
The venue will open 15 minutes prior to the event, and space is limited.
By selecting the event on the app, it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.

items.name: Delight Trio
items.introduction: Direct from Colombia, the Delight trio presents a wide range of musical genres with a percussive twist.
items.shortDescription: A Latin Trio with a world repertoire.
items.longDescription: Hailing from Colombia Delight Trio's passion for music is as palpable as the energy in their performances. Delight Trio blends music from around the globe including rock, pop, disco, and funk with a danceable mix of bossa nova, Latin, and global rhythms.

items.name: Horseplay Seahorse Auction
items.introduction: 50-dollar bid now y’abletabid 75 bid 100—it’s time to bid on the soon-to-be-winning seahorse of your jockey dreams.
items.shortDescription: Live auction to become proud seahorse owners.
items.longDescription: At the start of the voyage, you'll have the opportunity to wage your best bids in a lighthearted, live auction to become proud seahorse owners who will eventually compete in Horseplay. After giving life to your seahorse through a private workshop with our resident artist, your personalized (and personally named) seahorse will compete to take home the glorious cash-prize and the most hilarious bragging rights on the ship.

items.name: Pop Quiz: Billboard Charts Music Trivia
items.introduction: Test your UK music smarts! Join us for Brit-inspired trivia, celebrating chart-topping British hits that rocked America and the world.
items.shortDescription: UK legends who made it big in the States.
items.longDescription: From Beatlemania to Britpop and beyond, this is your moment to salute the UK hitmakers who stormed the American charts. "Pop Quiz: Billboard Charts Music Trivia" celebrates the British invasion(s) that had the world singing from powerhouse vocals to unforgettable anthems. Test your knowledge of the artists who waved the Union Jack all the way to number one. Cheeky, chart-topping, and oh-so-Virgin this is trivia with a British accent and a global legacy.

items.name: -Up With A Twist: A Sumptuous Dinner & Show Experience - Book on Board! ($USD)
Guest Artist: Taylor Reed
items.introduction: Groove to the soulful sounds of Taylor Reed as she weaves violin melodies with percussion beats!
items.shortDescription: Soulful strings and angelic vocals.
items.longDescription: Hailing from Tampa, FL, Taylor Reed channels her natural creativity and spontaneity through a looping station, building an elegantly layered, engrossingly soulful sound. Weaving violin melodies, bold and invigorating percussion, and angelic vocals through groove-infused creations, her pop/R&B music elevates any space.

items.name: Salty Trivia: Bevvies and Bites
items.introduction: A pub-style trivia game—created uniquely each day.
items.shortDescription: Not your average Pub-style trivia game.
items.longDescription: The Happenings Cast compiles the best of pop culture, history, current events and beyond in a uniquely multi-round trivia event created for your voyage. Each team will have a booklet to fill out for each round of 10 questions. But this isn’t your average trivia game—this Salty Trivia expands beyond generations, giving you the freshest, funniest brain-twisters you can find on the open ocean (or anywhere, for that matter).
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
The venue will open 15 minutes prior to the event, and space is limited.
By selecting 'book,"  it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.

items.name: Unique Duo
items.introduction: Experience Unique Duo, Polish artists reimagining hits with jazz, soul, pop & funk.
items.shortDescription: Polish duo reimagines hits.
items.longDescription: Experience Unique Duo, a versatile Polish act blending jazz, soul, pop, funk, and more. With live looping, they reinvent beloved hits into fresh, unforgettable arrangements. Energetic, stylish, and full of charm, this dynamic duo transforms every performance into a one-of-a-kind musical journey.

items.name: Red Hot
items.introduction: Diving into the life of Sir Richard Branson through archival footage, iconic songs, thrilling choreography and stunning vocals.
items.shortDescription: A rockumentary revue celebrating Virgin's legacy!
items.longDescription: Red Hot is a turbo-charged tribute to Virgin’s fearless legacy, blazing with iconic music, explosive choreography, and high-tech spectacle. From Branson’s rebel spirit to some of Virgin Records’ greatest hits, this show delivers pure energy and joy.
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event. The venue will open at the posted start time, and space is limited.
By selecting 'book', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Doors open 15 minutes prior to the show.
Standby line will be open 30 minutes prior to the show on a first come first serve basis.
Fog effects will be used.
Just an FYI for those possibly impacted —strobe, lasers and CO2 effects will be used.

items.name: Risky Quizness
items.introduction: Pop on some socks, a white button-down and shades and slide into this far-from-average trivia game.
items.shortDescription: Trivia with a Virgin twist.
items.longDescription: Teams get together to play rounds of trivia for the chance to fill your jar with golden barnacles. One Sailor from the winning team of each round will get a chance to face what we call “Trial-by-Trivia” and spin the wheel. Will you lose a team member? Have the chance to sing for extra points? With wild challenges and hilarious twists, it’s far from your average trivia game.
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event. The venue will open 15 minutes prior to the event, and space is limited.
By selecting 'book', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.

items.name: Pink Agave After Dark
items.introduction: With our resident DJ mixing it up, join us at Pink Agave for a celebration of life, CDMX food, and the largest tequila and mezcal collection at sea.
items.shortDescription: Bites, beats, and libations at Pink Agave.
items.longDescription: Get your glow on in Pink Agave’s after hours agave lounge. With our resident DJ setting the mood to start your night on the right foot — or end it (dancing) in style.
needToKnows: A reservation at Pink Agave is recommended to attend this event.
By selecting 'add to agenda', it does not guarantee admission to the event.

items.name: Guest Artist: Kennedi & the Groove
items.introduction: This fearless band isn't afraid to swerve across decades and musical genres during live sets that cover everything from funk, to pop and disco.
items.shortDescription: Funk, pop, disco, and rock hits sung with soul.
items.longDescription: Kennedi & The Groove has its origins at sea in 2021. On board a Cruise Ship where Kennedi met the four piece band that will later be known as The Groove. The connection was instant and together they created a headliner show and started to work on their repertoire with the goal of working on cruises. After a 3 month period in a 5 star hotel in South Korea, they were able to achieve what they've been working towards for almost 2 years, a contract with Virgin Voyages.

items.name: Holiday Grog Walk at Draught Haus - Book On Board!
Holiday Grog Walk at Sip Lounge ($ USD) - Book On Board!
-Up With A Twist: A Sumptuous Dinner & Show Experience - Book on Board! ($USD)
Red Hot
items.introduction: Diving into the life of Sir Richard Branson through archival footage, iconic songs, thrilling choreography and stunning vocals.
items.shortDescription: A rockumentary revue celebrating Virgin's legacy!
items.longDescription: Red Hot is a turbo-charged tribute to Virgin’s fearless legacy, blazing with iconic music, explosive choreography, and high-tech spectacle. From Branson’s rebel spirit to some of Virgin Records’ greatest hits, this show delivers pure energy and joy.
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event. The venue will open at the posted start time, and space is limited.
By selecting 'book', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Doors open 15 minutes prior to the show.
Standby line will be open 30 minutes prior to the show on a first come first serve basis.
Fog effects will be used.
Just an FYI for those possibly impacted —strobe, lasers and CO2 effects will be used.

items.name: Karaoke with the Happenings Cast
items.introduction: Sing your heart out, Sailors.
items.shortDescription: It's an onboard karaoke night, Sailors.
items.longDescription: Just by being here on board, you're a bonafide star. Don't even try to fight it, it's the truth. So indulge that very truth and join the Happenings Cast for a wild night of tunes, trills, and togetherness. Everyone has their favorite karaoke song, so come show us yours. And your star power behind it.

items.name: Unique Duo
items.introduction: Experience Unique Duo, Polish artists reimagining hits with jazz, soul, pop & funk.
items.shortDescription: Polish duo reimagines hits.
items.longDescription: Experience Unique Duo, a versatile Polish act blending jazz, soul, pop, funk, and more. With live looping, they reinvent beloved hits into fresh, unforgettable arrangements. Energetic, stylish, and full of charm, this dynamic duo transforms every performance into a one-of-a-kind musical journey.

items.name: Guest Artists: Dustin Monk & The Hustle
items.introduction: From turning chairs on "The Voice" to turning heads in the music industry, Dustin Monk & The Hustle brings Hollywood rock experience to Virgin Voyages
items.shortDescription: A rock ensemble with the heartbeat of soul and R&B
items.longDescription: Rising to fame on Season 9 of NBC's "The Voice," Dustin managed to catch the attention and turn the chairs of Blake Shelton and Adam Levine. Now he's doing more than turning chairs -- he's filling them with fans all around the country. Rooted in rock n' roll, the catchy sound of Dustin Monk & The Hustle is also inspired by a fusion of Blues, Soul, Funk, and R&B.

items.name: Club Night Featuring Queen HD the DJ
items.introduction: Queen HD the DJ brings high-energy sets, sharp scratching, and nostalgic grooves—get ready to dance all night with this global party-starter!
items.shortDescription: Queen HD spins high-energy, nostalgic party vibes.
items.longDescription: Queen HD The DJ is a high-energy, self-taught Baltimore DJ known for sharp scratching and nostalgic grooves. She’s battled in NYC, DC, and Atlanta, and DJed globally from London to Botswana. She’s the official DJ for the Washington Spirit, spun for Team USA Soccer, and made history as the first queer Black woman to DJ on the White House South Lawn. Expect an electrifying set that blends nostalgia with unstoppable energy.
